item.description:
Opening it up for anyone else who is interested.  For more information, please see the following:

http://www.cvsdowntown5k.com/

Rather than taking a team approach, I encourage anyone who is interested to register as an individual member.  On the day of the race, we'll meet up roughly an hour or two ahead of time at the Rhode Island State House, and meet up as the same place after the race is finished.

Registration is $28-29, depending when you register.  Online registration is available.  Your shirt and number you can pick up prior to or on the day of the race.  In addition, the registration will ask you for your "projected" time of finishing the 5K.  I run roughly a 25 minute 5K, for example.

Any questions, comments and/or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask.  Should be a fun day of running.  If you have anything to add, please don't hesitate to comment.
item.name: CVS Caremark Downtown 5K
